games.title: Games
games.deleteGame: Are you sure you want to delete this game?

general.addPlayerHelperText: You can add players here. The owner of the game is able to delete the game and add other players, whereas players can only update game data.
general.cantDeleteOwner: This is the owner of the game. The owner cannot be deleted.
general.deleteGameConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this game?
general.deleteGameWarning: Delete this game and all related data. This action is irreversible!
general.downloadGameHelperText: Advanced: You can download the JSON data of this game and use it for yourself, or copy parts of it and upload a new game here.

factories.recipeHelperText: These are the recipes produced in this factory. Add a recipe, select recipe and amount of machines and hit the save icon. After saving, the factory inputs and outputs should be displayed above this table.
factories.noInputsOutputsStarter: Add recipes in the recipe table below to start producing products in this factory.
factories.noInputsOutputs: There are no inputs or outputs from this factory. If this is intended: GREAT JOB!
